title: Facebook buys an unused headquarters even as more employees work remotely
text: Facebook is buying a previously unused corporate headquarters from outdoor retailer REI, despite the social media company's plans to shift more of its employees to working from home.

title: Facebook Is Failing in Global Disinformation Fight, Says Former Worker
text: The employee, who worked in a group dedicated to rooting out fake accounts, said executives ignored or were slow to react to her warnings.

title: Wistleblower alleges Facebook was slow to act on evidence of political manipulation
text: CNBC's Julia Boorstin reports Facebook was slow to act on crucial evidence of political manipulation, according to a report in Buzzfeed.

title: Facebook Gaming partners can now play copyrighted music during livestreams
text: Other creators can expect to get this feature soon, too.

title: Facebook buys REI’s new HQ for $367M, expanding Seattle-area footprint to more than 3M square feet
text: Facebook is yet again expanding in the Seattle region, its largest engineering hub outside of Silicon Valley.

title: Facebook launches a climate change information center and commits to eliminating ‘scope 3’ emissions by 2030
text: Even as Facebook, the world’s largest social media platform, admits that climate change “is real” and that “the science is unambiguous and the need to act grows more urgent by the day” the platform appears unwilling to take steps to really stand up to the climate change denialism that circulates on its platform.  The company […]

title: Irish High court freezes probe into Facebook's EU-U.S. data flows
text: Ireland's High Court on Monday temporarily froze a probe by Facebook's lead European Union regulator into the legality of the U.S. social media giant's transatlantic data flows, a court spokesman said.

title: Facebook allows users to watch videos together online
text: Facebook Inc said on Monday that its users will now be able to watch videos with their friends online using the social media company's Messenger app, enabling them to see reactions in real time.

title: Facebook introduces a co-viewing experience in Messenger, ‘Watch Together’
text: Facebook today is rolling out a new feature that will allow friends and family to watch videos together over Messenger. The feature, called “Watch Together,” works with all Facebook Watch video content, including its original programs, user uploads, creator content, live streams, and soon, music videos.

title: Facebook Connect: What to expect from the company's big VR show
text: Virtual reality hasn't gone mainstream, but the industry is still moving forward.

title: Facebook suffers blow in Australia legal fight over Cambridge Analytica
text: Tech giant fails to convince court it doesn’t carry out business in Australia as privacy regulator accuses Facebook of breaches
